Original: Until now, the greatest threat we'd
known in the Lush Woodlands were the
black bears... the [Enemy1:84]s.
[Page]
But now we're getting reports of a
bear with red fur, as if stained with
blood. It seems much more fearsome.
[Page]
Encountering new species means, on the
one hand, that our explorations are
advancing, but we can't celebrate yet.
[Page]
Not after these casualties. It's safe
to say that this red-furred beast has
the run of the lower floors.
[Page]
And so I have issued a mission to
[Color:5]eliminate the threat lurking in the
Lush Woodlands[Color:0]!
[Page]
We must secure our explorers' safety
by eradicating whatever thwarts our
search, starting with this beast.
[Page]
The mission will be more dangerous
than any you have faced, so it would
not do for you to be unprepared.
[Page]
I have asked the Guildmaster to supply
you with something that will help you
stay alive in the labyrinths.
[Page]
Stop by the Explorers Guild and see
him before you go any further. That's
all from me! Best of luck, then.
Translation: Until now, the greatest threat we'd
known in the Lush Woodlands were the
black bears... the [Enemy1:84]s.
[Page]
But now we're getting reports of a
bear with red fur, as if stained with
blood. It seems much more fearsome.
[Page]
Encountering new species means, on the
one hand, that our explorations are
advancing, but we can't celebrate yet.
[Page]
Not after these casualties. It's safe
to say that this red-furred beast has
the run of the lower floors.
[Page]
And so I have issued a mission to
[Color:5]eliminate the threat lurking in the
Lush Woodlands[Color:0]!
[Page]
We must secure our explorers' safety
by eradicating whatever thwarts our
search, starting with this beast.
[Page]
The mission will be more dangerous
than any you have faced, so it would
not do for you to be unprepared.
[Page]
I have asked the Guildmaster to supply
you with something that will help you
stay alive in the labyrinths.
[Page]
Stop by the Explorers Guild and see
him before you go any further. That's
all from me! Best of luck, then.

Original: Interesting. I'm impressed that you've
slain the leader of those beasts!
You've come so far in a short time.
[Page]
I wonder, though, what was that stone
tablet? And you say you found it on
top of an altar... Hmm...
[Page]
I'll send my soldiers and sages to
investigate the altar. You keep the
tablet for now... you may need it.
[Page]
Wasn't there an [Color:5]emblem[Color:0] on the monument
near the northern barrier much like the
one on your tablet? Here's an idea...
[Page]
Try [Color:5]taking that tablet to the stone
monument[Color:0] in the north, and see what
you can accomplish that way.
[Page]
But that's enough out of me for now,
certainly. You must be tired. Just
one more thing before you go...
[Page]
Well done on your mission! I'm proud
of you for returning safely, and you
should be too. Rest well, [Guild].
Translation: Interesting. I'm impressed that you've
slain the leader of those beasts!
You've come so far in a short time.
[Page]
I wonder, though, what was that stone
tablet? And you say you found it on
top of an altar... Hmm...
[Page]
I'll send my soldiers and sages to
investigate the altar. You keep the
tablet for now... you may need it.
[Page]
Wasn't there an [Color:5]emblem[Color:0] on the monument
near the northern barrier much like the
one on your tablet? Here's an idea...
[Page]
Try [Color:5]taking that tablet to the stone
monument[Color:0] in the north, and see what
you can accomplish that way.
[Page]
But that's enough out of me for now,
certainly. You must be tired. Just
one more thing before you go...
[Page]
Well done on your mission! I'm proud
of you for returning safely, and you
should be too. Rest well, [Guild].

Original: When you open the door and enter the
hall, you are faced with battered
armor scattered everywhere.
Translation: When you open the door and enter the
hall, you are faced with battered
armor scattered everywhere.

Original: At the center of these bloodstained
heaps is a beast whose fur is stained
crimson...
[Page]
This can only be the red-furred beast
rumored to be attacking soldiers and
explorers!
[Page]
Have a care, for the beast's eyes are
narrowed as it readies itself for
your approach!
Translation: At the center of these bloodstained
heaps is a beast whose fur is stained
crimson...
[Page]
This can only be the red-furred beast
rumored to be attacking soldiers and
explorers!
[Page]
Have a care, for the beast's eyes are
narrowed as it readies itself for
your approach!

Original: The red-furred beast, finding itself
at a disadvantage, suddenly flees.
It charges towards a nearby wall...
Translation: The red-furred beast, finding itself
at a disadvantage, suddenly flees.
It charges towards a nearby wall...

Original: After instantly tearing the wall apart
with its sharp claws, it passes into
the space beyond.
[Page]
You are left stunned by its speed, but
its path is marked by traces of blood
leading to a stairway downward.
Translation: After instantly tearing the wall apart
with its sharp claws, it passes into
the space beyond.
[Page]
You are left stunned by its speed, but
its path is marked by traces of blood
leading to a stairway downward.

Original: It seems there are even lower reaches
to the Lush Woodlands. You hesitate to
call your objective complete yet...
[Page]
You know you must eventually pursue
it, but it may also be wise at this
point to return to Tharsis.
Translation: It seems there are even lower reaches
to the Lush Woodlands. You hesitate to
call your objective complete yet...
[Page]
You know you must eventually pursue
it, but it may also be wise at this
point to return to Tharsis.

Original: I'm glad to see that you're safe,
members of [Guild]. How are you
finding things on B3F?
[Page]
A giant beast's roar, hm...? I see.
It sounds as if something worse than
the Bloodbear may lurk down there.
[Page]
The Lush Woodlands will not be safe
to explore unless something is done.
Keep at it, and stay on your toes.
Translation: I'm glad to see that you're safe,
members of [Guild]. How are you
finding things on B3F?
[Page]
A giant beast's roar, hm...? I see.
It sounds as if something worse than
the Bloodbear may lurk down there.
[Page]
The Lush Woodlands will not be safe
to explore unless something is done.
Keep at it, and stay on your toes.

Original: Eventually, you reach a small room
with a spring. Near it is the red-
furred beast, licking its wounds.
[Page]
On seeing you, it gives a threatening
snarl. It seems it has no intention
of fleeing this time.
[Page]
When you are ready, step forward and
let your second round begin!
Translation: Eventually, you reach a small room
with a spring. Near it is the red-
furred beast, licking its wounds.
[Page]
On seeing you, it gives a threatening
snarl. It seems it has no intention
of fleeing this time.
[Page]
When you are ready, step forward and
let your second round begin!

Original: The red-furred beast falls before the
onslaught of your fierce attacks.
[Page]
You have defeated a powerful foe, at
the request of the nobility, no less!
But your joy is short-lived.
Translation: The red-furred beast falls before the
onslaught of your fierce attacks.
[Page]
You have defeated a powerful foe, at
the request of the nobility, no less!
But your joy is short-lived.

Original: For suddenly, a beastly roar shakes
the entire maze!
[Page]
The sadness and anger of losing
a comrade is unmistakable in that
deafening roar.
[Page]
One after another, you hear answering
roars from other beasts. You stand
there, stunned, as the roars die down.
[Page]
The succession of roars is disturbing,
but not so much as that first howl.
It was very different from the others.
[Page]
You think there can be no doubt that
something on this level far surpasses
the threat of the Bloodbear...
Translation: For suddenly, a beastly roar shakes
the entire maze!
[Page]
The sadness and anger of losing
a comrade is unmistakable in that
deafening roar.
[Page]
One after another, you hear answering
roars from other beasts. You stand
there, stunned, as the roars die down.
[Page]
The succession of roars is disturbing,
but not so much as that first howl.
It was very different from the others.
[Page]
You think there can be no doubt that
something on this level far surpasses
the threat of the Bloodbear...

Original: As you carry out your search, a sense
of menace from beyond the door causes
you to stop in your tracks.
[Page]
You think it safe to assume that past
this point is the creature which
surpasses that red-furred beast.
[Page]
You take a deep breath, wondering if
you are ready to open the door and
behold this fierce adversary yourself.
Translation: As you carry out your search, a sense
of menace from beyond the door causes
you to stop in your tracks.
[Page]
You think it safe to assume that past
this point is the creature which
surpasses that red-furred beast.
[Page]
You take a deep breath, wondering if
you are ready to open the door and
behold this fierce adversary yourself.

Original: When you make up your mind and open
the door, you find a vast, open space
rich with the smell of beasts.
[Page]
Within it awaits an enormous scarlet
brute, glaring at you. Its eyes burn
with rage...
[Page]
There is no room for error. This must
be the leader of the red-furred beasts
who rule the Lush Woodlands.
[Page]
You glance at the springs to the east
and west of the hall, where other red-
furred beasts roam.
[Page]
If they choose to come to the aid of
their leader during the battle, your
situation will become hopeless.
[Page]
The ideal scenario would be to draw
the leader deeper within, without the
other beasts noticing, but how?
[Page]
You study your surroundings carefully,
looking to the environment for any
advantage...
Translation: When you make up your mind and open
the door, you find a vast, open space
rich with the smell of beasts.
[Page]
Within it awaits an enormous scarlet
brute, glaring at you. Its eyes burn
with rage...
[Page]
There is no room for error. This must
be the leader of the red-furred beasts
who rule the Lush Woodlands.
[Page]
You glance at the springs to the east
and west of the hall, where other red-
furred beasts roam.
[Page]
If they choose to come to the aid of
their leader during the battle, your
situation will become hopeless.
[Page]
The ideal scenario would be to draw
the leader deeper within, without the
other beasts noticing, but how?
[Page]
You study your surroundings carefully,
looking to the environment for any
advantage...

Original: With the leader of the red-furred
beasts defeated, the murderous aura
permeating this maze dissipates...
[Page]
You have eliminated the greatest
threat to the exploration of the Lush
Woodlands! Your mission is complete.
[Page]
Finally at rest, you take a look
around the area. The altar-like object
further on seems clearly man-made.
Translation: With the leader of the red-furred
beasts defeated, the murderous aura
permeating this maze dissipates...
[Page]
You have eliminated the greatest
threat to the exploration of the Lush
Woodlands! Your mission is complete.
[Page]
Finally at rest, you take a look
around the area. The altar-like object
further on seems clearly man-made.

Original: A stone tablet is enshrined upon
the altar.
Translation: A stone tablet is enshrined upon
the altar.

Original: There are words on the stone tablet in
an unfamiliar language, but they are
so weathered, no sage could read them.
[Page]
But the emblem in the center of it
is another story. It is the same one
engraved in the monument to the north.
[Page]
You decide to remove the stone tablet
from the altar and bring it back, in
hopes it can aid the investigation.
Translation: There are words on the stone tablet in
an unfamiliar language, but they are
so weathered, no sage could read them.
[Page]
But the emblem in the center of it
is another story. It is the same one
engraved in the monument to the north.
[Page]
You decide to remove the stone tablet
from the altar and bring it back, in
hopes it can aid the investigation.

Original: Tempting though the altar may be,
the monsters that have wounded many
adventurers are your highest priority!
Translation: Tempting though the altar may be,
the monsters that have wounded many
adventurers are your highest priority!

Original: You return to Tharsis from the depths
of the Lush Woodland, the Bloodbear's
head in hand.
[Page]
You still cannot forget the fearsome
roar that shook the entire labyrinth
when the blood-red beast fell.
[Page]
Until the owner of that roar has
fallen, [Color:5]you cannot consider the
Count's mission to be complete[Color:0].
[Page]
While you are lost in thought, a man
approaches you. You recognize him
as Whirlwind.
Translation: You return to Tharsis from the depths
of the Lush Woodland, the Bloodbear's
head in hand.
[Page]
You still cannot forget the fearsome
roar that shook the entire labyrinth
when the blood-red beast fell.
[Page]
Until the owner of that roar has
fallen, [Color:5]you cannot consider the
Count's mission to be complete[Color:0].
[Page]
While you are lost in thought, a man
approaches you. You recognize him
as Whirlwind.

Original: "Glad to see we both made it out.
Amazing that you beat the Bloodbear
when the Tharsis soldiers couldn't!
[Page]
"So how're things? The monsters down
on B3F giving you any trouble?"
Translation: "Glad to see we both made it out.
Amazing that you beat the Bloodbear
when the Tharsis soldiers couldn't!
[Page]
"So how're things? The monsters down
on B3F giving you any trouble?"

Original: [Color:5]Tell him that they are?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Tell him that they are?[Color:0]

Original: "Good to hear! Sounds like you've got
it under control. It's normal that
[Color:5]monsters get harder the lower you go[Color:0].
[Page]
"Dealing with the tougher critters is
the key to making it through a maze.
I'm glad to hear you're managing.
[Page]
"But if you have trouble doing it in
the future, think about maybe [Color:5]going
to another labyrinth for practice[Color:0].
[Page]
"There's bound to be one out there
somewhere that your party can tackle."
Translation: "Good to hear! Sounds like you've got
it under control. It's normal that
[Color:5]monsters get harder the lower you go[Color:0].
[Page]
"Dealing with the tougher critters is
the key to making it through a maze.
I'm glad to hear you're managing.
[Page]
"But if you have trouble doing it in
the future, think about maybe [Color:5]going
to another labyrinth for practice[Color:0].
[Page]
"There's bound to be one out there
somewhere that your party can tackle."

Original: "That's too bad... Have you thought
about going to the [Color:5]Valley Spring[Color:0]?
[Page]
"It's south of the [Color:5]Small Orchard[Color:0], in
the middle of the valley with the
giant beasts wandering around.
[Page]
"You can gather rare materials at that
spring and fight some tough monsters.
I think you're up to the challenge.
[Page]
"The [Color:5][Enemy1:89][Color:0] might get in your
way, but it loves [Color:5]vegetables[Color:0]. Drop one
near it, and it'll pounce right over."
Translation: "That's too bad... Have you thought
about going to the [Color:5]Valley Spring[Color:0]?
[Page]
"It's south of the [Color:5]Small Orchard[Color:0], in
the middle of the valley with the
giant beasts wandering around.
[Page]
"You can gather rare materials at that
spring and fight some tough monsters.
I think you're up to the challenge.
[Page]
"The [Color:5][Enemy1:89][Color:0] might get in your
way, but it loves [Color:5]vegetables[Color:0]. Drop one
near it, and it'll pounce right over."

Original: You say farewell to Whirlwind and he
disappears through the city gates.
Translation: You say farewell to Whirlwind and he
disappears through the city gates.

Original: As you leave the Grand Court, you pass
a young girl.
[Page]
You believe you have seen her behind
the counter at the Berund Atelier.
As your eyes meet, she smiles.
Translation: As you leave the Grand Court, you pass
a young girl.
[Page]
You believe you have seen her behind
the counter at the Berund Atelier.
As your eyes meet, she smiles.

Original: "Wow, didja have some bidness wit
da Outland Count?
[Page]
"He's all fired up bout dis mission.
I got da big shipment of [Color:6][Item:1356][Color:0]s
and [Color:6][Item:1371][Color:0]s he aksed for.
[Page]
"Iunno if ya know, but [Color:6][Item:1356][Color:0]s
carry ya to da last stairs ya used.
[Page]
"An da [Color:6][Item:1371][Color:0] takes ya clean
outta da labyrint. Kinda like da
[Color:6][Item:1355][Color:0], akshally.
[Page]
"I got em out in da store, so c'mon
and take a look-see if ya wanna!"
Translation: "Wow, didja have some bidness wit
da Outland Count?
[Page]
"He's all fired up bout dis mission.
I got da big shipment of [Color:6][Item:1356][Color:0]s
and [Color:6][Item:1371][Color:0]s he aksed for.
[Page]
"Iunno if ya know, but [Color:6][Item:1356][Color:0]s
carry ya to da last stairs ya used.
[Page]
"An da [Color:6][Item:1371][Color:0] takes ya clean
outta da labyrint. Kinda like da
[Color:6][Item:1355][Color:0], akshally.
[Page]
"I got em out in da store, so c'mon
and take a look-see if ya wanna!"

Original: ...It sounds as if items useful to
your adventure have been stocked.
[Page]
If you are interested, go to the
Berund Atelier to see what it is
they have.
Translation: ...It sounds as if items useful to
your adventure have been stocked.
[Page]
If you are interested, go to the
Berund Atelier to see what it is
they have.

Original: "You're the [Guild] Guild, right?
I can't let you head to the lower area
of the Lush Woodlands like that.
[Page]
"Go see the Guildmaster at the
Explorers Guild, and he'll give you
what you need to go deeper."
Translation: "You're the [Guild] Guild, right?
I can't let you head to the lower area
of the Lush Woodlands like that.
[Page]
"Go see the Guildmaster at the
Explorers Guild, and he'll give you
what you need to go deeper."

Original: There y'are, [Guild]. The Outland
Count told me a bit about what you'll
be facing.
[Page]
The red beastie on B2F of the Lush
Woodlands... you're a mite lacking
in strength to be hunting that thing.
[Page]
That's why, as overseer of the guild,
I've got a new kind of skill for you.
Translation: There y'are, [Guild]. The Outland
Count told me a bit about what you'll
be facing.
[Page]
The red beastie on B2F of the Lush
Woodlands... you're a mite lacking
in strength to be hunting that thing.
[Page]
That's why, as overseer of the guild,
I've got a new kind of skill for you.

Original: That there's a Burst Skill.
The essence of the techniques your
forebears used is written down in it.
[Page]
There are more to find, and I suggest
y'do. Burst Skills will do a lot to
up your survivability in the wild.
Translation: That there's a Burst Skill.
The essence of the techniques your
forebears used is written down in it.
[Page]
There are more to find, and I suggest
y'do. Burst Skills will do a lot to
up your survivability in the wild.

Original: [Color:3]You can now use Burst Skills![Color:0]
[Page]
Translation: [Color:3]You can now use Burst Skills![Color:0]
[Page]

Original: [Color:5]End the explanation?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]End the explanation?[Color:0]

Original: Ah... new faces, hm? Welcome to the
[Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0].
[Page]
I've heard rumors about you,
[Guild]. But now's maybe not the
time for the pleasantries.
[Page]
That red beastie down on B2F of the
Lush Woodlands... you're a mite weak
to go hunting it, I'd say.
[Page]
That's why, as overseer of the guild,
I've got a new kind of skill for you.
Translation: Ah... new faces, hm? Welcome to the
[Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0].
[Page]
I've heard rumors about you,
[Guild]. But now's maybe not the
time for the pleasantries.
[Page]
That red beastie down on B2F of the
Lush Woodlands... you're a mite weak
to go hunting it, I'd say.
[Page]
That's why, as overseer of the guild,
I've got a new kind of skill for you.

Original: As you proceed through B2F of the
Lush Woodlands, you encounter a group
of Tharsis soldiers.
[Page]
Many of them seem injured... some can
barely walk, even with the support of
their comrades.
Translation: As you proceed through B2F of the
Lush Woodlands, you encounter a group
of Tharsis soldiers.
[Page]
Many of them seem injured... some can
barely walk, even with the support of
their comrades.

Original: "You explorers?" asks one. "What a
sorry lot we are... We're going back
to Tharsis." His hands shake angrily.
[Page]
"We never stood a chance. While we
hunted the red-furred beast, a [Enemy1:84]
found us. You can guess the rest.
[Page]
"We looked everywhere, but there's no
sign of the red-furred thing. Maybe
it's hiding [Color:5]somewhere in the thicket[Color:0]?"
Translation: "You explorers?" asks one. "What a
sorry lot we are... We're going back
to Tharsis." His hands shake angrily.
[Page]
"We never stood a chance. While we
hunted the red-furred beast, a [Enemy1:84]
found us. You can guess the rest.
[Page]
"We looked everywhere, but there's no
sign of the red-furred thing. Maybe
it's hiding [Color:5]somewhere in the thicket[Color:0]?"

Original: It seems that it will not be easy to
find the red-furred beast you hunt.
[Page]
You prepare yourselves for an extended
search and resume your journey.
Translation: It seems that it will not be easy to
find the red-furred beast you hunt.
[Page]
You prepare yourselves for an extended
search and resume your journey.
